title: Prigozhin Told the Truth About Putin's War in Ukraine
description:
Yevgeny Prigozhin is a disinformation artist whose failed rebellion was marked by a burst of radical honesty. 

The post Prigozhin Told the Truth About Putin’s War in Ukraine appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Israel Ramps Up Drone Sales to Morocco for Its Colonial War in Western Sahara
description:
Morocco recognized Israel as part of the Abraham Accords — and is reaping its rewards against the Polisario Front.

The post Israel Ramps Up Drone Sales to Morocco for Its Colonial War in Western Sahara appeared first on The Intercept.
